ygData.subject: Re: Diamond Dust Location Revealed
ygData.msgSnippet: most excellent yes I am excited!  Expect me to be going to permafrost soon and see if I can grabs meself some of this dust!!! I noticed that the gemcutter is
ygData.messageBody:
most excellent yes I am excited! Expect me to be going to permafrost soon
and see if I can grabs meself some of this dust!!!

I noticed that the gemcutter is still a mysterious item. Not a container,
not a wieldable item, and combining it in a jewelry bag with a gem produced
the hated "These items do not combine..." message... perhaps an attempt with
gem AND metal might produce alternative items, with higher stat benefits or
even a earring where one might expect a ring (?)

I look forward to my and others experiments with this newly found item!

Cogg - 36 three times last night
Rallos Zek

----- Original Message -----
From: <eqtinker@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 9:18 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond Dust Location Revealed


> From: eqtinker@...
>
> Greetings All!
>
> Well, if you liked the pictures recently posted to the compendium, how
> about a location? That's right, Derkal Pentolite has revealed his source
> of Diamond Dust to the Tinkering Community! Drop by the compendium for
> the information.
>
> I now expect all able Gnomes to go forth and confirm this location. Think
> of it as a project for the weekend. If you do confirm it, please write
> in so I may post it for all other Gnomes to see. Heck, be the first Gnome
> to send in a picture with the dust in your inventory, and I'll post it to
> the compendium too.
>
> Thanks!
> Fulcrum of Fennin Ro
> Ak'Anon's Engineering Emissary
> Custodian of Fulcrum's Tinkering Compendium
> http://www.geocities.com/eqtinker
>
